posts.post_title: Looking for lower grade (but graded) King Kelly
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Mike W
Im looking for either a SGC 20 or 30 N162 Kelly or a PSA 2 or 3 N28 Kelly for a reasonable price.  Please contact me if you have anything available.  Thanks! "wolfnova1@aol.com"
